article.title: Northrop to Continue Developing C-RAM Command and Control System
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Herndon, Virginia was awarded a $38,712,496 cost-plus-incentive-fee, sole-source contract with options for continued software development, maintenance, and training on the Counter-Rocket Artillery Mortar Command and Control System. Work will be performed in Carson, California, with an estimated completion date of March 31, 2020. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance (Army) and research, development, testing and evaluation funds are being obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W31P4Q-15-C-0065).
